data.title: Westfield Washington School District
data.meta_description: Medical/HSA BENEFITS - Westfield Washington School District
data.text:
Anthem Sydney App

Download the Anthem Sydney app by clicking the link below. Always have your Anthem ID cards available, see your claims and your current deductible/out of pocket maximum, find care and cost for care.

Sydney Health App

HEALTH SAVINGS ACCOUNT (HSA)

A UMB Bank Health Savings Account (HSA) is associated for those enrolled in a high deductible plan only. (HDHP 1 OR HDHP 2) During the online enrollment process you will indicate the per pay HSA deduction that will start with the 1/5/2024 payroll. The next step is for employees who enroll in a high deductible health plan and have previously not opened a health savings account (HSA) through UMB Bank. Click on the link below and follow the instructions to open your new HSA account. HSA payroll deductions can start, stop or be changed at any time during the year by contacting the Benefits Coordinator. The brochure below contains all information associated with an HSA along with instructions on opening your online account with UMB Bank.

The annual IRS contribution maximum will increase to $4,150 for employee-only coverage and $8,300 for all other coverage levels. The age 55 & older $1,000 catch-up contribution remains the same.

UMB HSA 2024

UMB HSA 2024 brochure

Open Your UMB HSA

For the enrollment Verification Number enter in the 1st Box:

THA0001

Enter in the 2nd Box :

144169

UMB Enrollment Guide

Flexible Spending Accounts (FSA)

Healthcare FSA-

Healthcare FSA reimbursement accounts must be re-enrolled in each year and is available to those enrolled the Anthem PPO medical plan only.
